name: Snow Leopard Vestige
description: Snow Leopard Vestiges are used at theTrophy Benchto create aSnow Leopard Trophy, which can help prospectors complete theBestiary. They are also used at theAdvanced Textiles Bench/Electric Textiles Benchto makeSnow Leopard Rugs. Decorative purposes aside, both provide a boost to coziness, which increases the duration and effect of theWell Rested Buff.
